CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains about warm-up task to MOT and leaves
CHI is squatting down next to toys looking at jack+in+the+box and MOT sits on little chair with her back to camera
MOT watches CHI . <aft> MOT looks around in room then at CHI
CHI turns head to look at door . <aft> CHI looks at toys
MOT leans forward towards jack+in+the+box . <aft> MOT turns crank
music is heard and all of a sudden clown pops up
<aft> MOT pushes clown back in box and closes lid
MOT squats down in front of CHI
<aft> MOT pulls CHI closer . <$=2> MOT takes of CHI's jacket and sweater
CHI squats down next to toys
MOT leans forward towards jack+in+the+box and turns crank
music is heard and all of a sudden clown pops up
CHI walks towards MOT holding her arms out
MOT places CHI on her arm
MOT picks up jack+in+the+box and holds it up in front of CHI
MOT looks at CHI then at jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes clown in box and closes lid
MOT puts CHI down on floor
CHI walks closer to jack+in+the+box and leans forward towards it
it is impossible to see what CHI does as MOT is in the way
MOT leans forward towards CHI . <aft> MOT turns jack+in+the+box crank
music is heard and all of a sudden clown pops up
INV asks MOT to move chair so she is not blocking camera's view and leaves
MOT gets up and places chair next to wastebasket
<aft> MOT picks up truck and holds it up in front of her and turns it around in her hands
<bef> CHI gets down on hands and knees . CHI crawls forward towards truck and duck
MOT puts truck on floor . <aft> MOT picks up duck and holds it up in front of CHI while squeezing it

<bef> MOT puts duck down in front of CHI . MOT picks up another rubber toy and squeezes it and then places it in front of CHI . <aft> MOT pushes clown back in box and closes lid and then straightens up
<aft> MOT looks at jack+in+the+box then at CHI
CHI leans forward towards rubber toys and picks one of them up . <aft> CHI straightens up and plays with toy
CHI looks at door then at jack+in+the+box
noises are heard from hallway outside
CHI grabs crank and pulls jack+in+the+box closer and then lifts it up
CHI continues to fidget with crank
CHI lets jack+in+the+box fall to the ground
MOT straightens up jack+in+the+box . <aft> MOT pushes clown back in box and tries to close lid
CHI leans towards cross taped on floor and starts playing with it
<bef> MOT closes lid and turns crank . MOT pushes clown back into box and closes lid
CHI plays with toys in front of her
CHI looks at toys in front of her
<bef> MOT pushes clown back in box and closes lid . MOT turns crank
CHI picks up toy duck and puts it on top of jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes box a little closer to CHI
MOT points to duck then straightens up
CHI picks up duck and places it on top of jack+in+the+box
CHI picks up another toy . <aft> CHI places it next to duck
CHI looks at toys in front of her
CHI reaches out for something in front of her
CHI picks up a toy and holds it up in front of her
<bef> CHI puts toy down on floor and reaches out for toys on jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at toys on jack+in+the+box

CHI grabs crank and pulls jack+in+the+box closer . <aft> CHI plays with crank and a little later jack+in+the+box glides down on floor and CHI bangs her hand on it . CHI drops duck then picks up other toy and places it on jack+in+the+box
the other toy falls off when jack+in+the+box glides down on floor
CHI picks up duck and places it on top of jack+in+the+box
CHI starts fidgeting with taped cross then plays with toys on top of jack+in+the+box
CHI throws a toy over jack+in+the+box
CHI reaches out for something in front of her
<aft> MOT moves chair to her left
CHI picks up a ball and throws it behind her
CHI turns head to see where ball lands
<bef> MOT gets up and picks up ball . MOT sits down on chair
<bef> MOT looks at ball . MOT looks at CHI
CHI follows ball with her eyes
MOT puts ball on floor . <aft> MOT pushes jack+in+the+box aside as well as other toys and picks up CHI whom she places on her leg and then picks up a toy
CHI takes toy and starts to slide down
CHI is standing up facing camera
MOT gets up . <aft> MOT walks in the direction of table
CHI drops toy in her hand
CHI looks at toy . <aft> CHI watches MOT
MOT walks back . <aft> MOT sits down
MOT moves chair a little to her right and reaches out for toys but pulls hands back to take ball
CHI bends down and picks up football then straightens up and gives ball to MOT
<aft> MOT puts ball on floor . <aft> MOT turns jack+in+the+box around
<aft> CHI picks up duck and throws it
<bef> MOT picks up duck and squeezes it . MOT kisses duck and offers it to CHI
<bef> MOT looks at duck . MOT looks at CHI
<bef> CHI looks at duck . CHI looks up at MOT
MOT holds duck out in front of CHI
CHI squats down in front of toys
MOT places duck on top of jack+in+the+box still holding onto it
MOT holds duck out in front of CHI
CHI takes duck and puts part of it in her mouth
MOT looks at CHI and nods head yes once
CHI squeezes duck . <aft> CHI holds duck out in front of her and then starts squeezing it again and gives it to MOT
CHI leans down towards other toys . <aft> CHI picks up truck but drops it
CHI picks up truck . <aft> CHI throws truck
<aft> MOT turns head to look at door
INV opens door . End of Warm-up
INV explains about Small Scale Activity to MOT while putting out toys on table and leaves room
CHI is put in high chair and starts playing with toys and MOT sits in a chair and fills out forms
INV sits down at table across from CHI and has MOT sit in chair next to CHI and then puts away all toys except beads . INV places forbidden object on table and explains tasks to MOT
MOT looks at object then at INV and then at object again
CHI looks at object as she reaches for the balls
MOT reaches out for CHI's hand
MOT looks at forbidden object then at CHI
CHI leans head closer to object
MOT looks at INV . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI plays with one of the balls
<aft> MOT pushes CHI's arm away from object
CHI holds onto ball and pulls object with her
MOT holds moves CHI's hand away from ball with her other hand . <aft> MOT places object further away from CHI
MOT looks at object then at CHI and then at object
CHI lifts beads up in the air
CHI leans forward towards object and lets beads touch balls
MOT reaches out for beads . <aft> MOT picks up beads
CHI looks at object as she reaches out for it
MOT gives CHI's hand a little push away from object
MOT moves object a little further away from CHI
MOT moves object to its former position and pulls hand back
CHI gets hold of a ball and pulls it towards her
MOT grabs hold of string with other hand
MOT tries to open up CHI's hand
MOT gets CHI to let go of ball and puts object on table
<bef> CHI reaches out for object . <aft> CHI grabs a ball and pulls it closer to herself
MOT puts object down on table
INV explains about four PCI boxes to MOT then fetches boxes and leaves room
CHI is sitting on floor facing camera and MOT is sitting across from her with box containing ball
MOT kneels down in front of CHI then looks at ball in box
MOT puts box on floor . <aft> MOT tilts box so CHI can see contents
CHI looks up over her shoulder as INV closes the door . <aft> CHI looks at contents of box
CHI picks up ball and lets it fall to the ground
CHI follows ball with her eyes
<aft> MOT picks up ball then turns box upside down and bounces ball on it once and then places ball on top of box
CHI takes ball and throws it
<aft> MOT moves box out of the way and picks up ball
MOT throws ball into CHI's lap
CHI picks up ball then lets it fall to the ground and reaches out for it
MOT pushes box further away and rolls ball to CHI
CHI holds onto ball while rolling it from her left to her right side and then loses her grip
ball rolls out of her reach
MOT rolls ball towards her . <aft> MOT throws ball into CHI's lap
CHI picks up ball and throws it
<bef> MOT picks up ball and hides it behind her back
CHI reaches hand out toward MOT
<bef> CHI looks at MOT . CHI looks at ball
ball hits CHI's hands and rolls towards MOT
MOT picks up ball and gives it to CHI
CHI throws ball . <aft> CHI reaches out towards box and ball
CHI looks at taped cross then at ball . <aft> CHI watches MOT
MOT pushes box further away . <aft> MOT grabs hold of box then of ball and puts box over ball
CHI pushes one end of box up
MOT pushes end of box further up . <aft> MOT puts box over ball again
CHI lifts box up in one end and picks up ball
<bef> MOT picks up box . MOT places box on floor
<aft> MOT takes ball out of box
MOT takes ball out of box . <aft> MOT holds ball up to her head
CHI reaches arms out towards ball while looking up at MOT
MOT holds ball up in front of her face
CHI takes ball . <aft> CHI holds ball up to her mouth
CHI looks at ball then at MOT
<bef> MOT takes ball out of box and places box on its side
CHI picks up ball . <aft> CHI throws ball
MOT catches ball and rolls it to CHI
CHI gives ball a little push
MOT picks up ball then throws it and catches it twice
CHI moves box closer to her and straightens it up
CHI looks at box then at MOT and then at box again
<4> MOT puts ball on floor in front of CHI
CHI reaches out for ball . <aft> CHI picks up ball and puts it in the box
MOT turns box upside down . <aft> MOT straightens up
<bef> CHI watches MOT . CHI looks at box
CHI puts hand on box and turns it over . <aft> CHI reaches out for ball and touches it but changes her mind and plays with taped cross
MOT picks up ball and puts it in box which she attempts to put on table
MOT puts box on table then changes her mind and puts box on floor
CHI moves toward the box MOT has taken away
MOT reaches out for a new box on desk
MOT looks at box then down to her left at box with ball
<aft> MOT puts box with ball on chair
CHI looks at box . <aft> CHI follows box with eyes
MOT puts box on floor . <aft> MOT opens box
CHI watches MOT . <aft> CHI looks at towel
MOT puts towel over her head
MOT puts box on top of lid
CHI grabs hold of one end of towel and lifts it up
CHI lets go of end of towel
CHI starts to crawl towards box
MOT lifts CHI up to a standing position
<aft> MOT takes towel and puts it over CHI's head and moves CHI a little further away
<aft> CHI turns towards boxes and later on loses her balance
MOT helps CHI regain her balance . <aft> MOT puts blanket over CHI's head
<aft> MOT puts towel over CHI's head
towel only covers top of CHI's head
CHI pulls towel off her head
CHI holds towel up to her face then lets it glide over her head
CHI looks at MOT . <aft> CHI looks down
<aft> MOT puts towel over CHI's head
<aft> MOT picks up towel and puts it over CHI's head
<bef> CHI starts walking towards box . CHI pulls off towel and loses her balance
MOT lifts up CHI and places her a little further away from her
CHI starts to crawl towards table
<bef> MOT picks up CHI and puts her in front of chair
CHI is standing up facing chair
CHI looks at door . <aft> CHI turns head and looks at MOT
towel is folded once in the middle
CHI loses balance and falls down
<aft> MOT taps towel with hand and then pulls CHI's arm but lets go of it
CHI looks at towel . <aft> CHI looks at door
CHI sits down and turns around
MOT puts lid loosely on box . <aft> MOT straightens up
CHI pushes lid almost all the way off
CHI pulls towel and box closer
CHI picks up towel and stands up
CHI looks at box then at MOT
MOT holds hand out towards towel
CHI walks towards table . <aft> CHI puts towel on table
CHI turns around so she is facing MOT . <aft> CHI starts walking towards box
CHI looks down in front of her . <aft> CHI looks at box
MOT puts towel in box and puts lid on loosely
<bef> CHI squats down next to box . CHI pushes lid off partway then picks up towel and stands up
MOT reaches out for box . <aft> MOT grabs box
CHI lets towel fall to the ground . <aft> CHI puts hand in box then pulls it back and starts walking towards the door
CHI turns head and looks at MOT
MOT puts towel in box . <aft> MOT puts lid on
MOT puts box on table and takes a new box
<aft> MOT places box on floor and takes lid off
<aft> MOT looks at CHI then at box
MOT looks at contents of box
CHI looks at contents of box
CHI squats down next to box
<aft> MOT draws a little then offers crayon to CHI
CHI takes crayon . <aft> CHI starts drawing
MOT picks up another crayon . <aft> MOT hides crayon behind her back and straightens up
MOT leans forward and puts hand on paper then pulls it back and straightens up
MOT is about to start drawing with crayon she had behind her back . <aft> MOT draws
MOT looks at CHI . <aft> MOT looks at paper
CHI puts crayon in mouth . <aft> CHI takes crayon out of mouth
CHI looks up at MOT then at paper . <aft> CHI watches MOT
CHI looks at crayon . <aft> CHI looks at crayons in her hand
<aft> MOT taps paper with finger and briefly looks up at CHI
CHI takes crayon out of mouth
CHI starts banging crayon on paper
CHI draws . <aft> CHI puts crayon in mouth
CHI looks at crayon in her other hand
CHI takes crayon out of mouth and plays with crayons
CHI moves crayon towards mouth . <aft> CHI starts drawing
CHI holds crayon up in front of her
CHI moves crayon up to her mouth then moves it away from mouth
CHI looks at MOT's hand then at crayon in hand she is not drawing with
MOT holds hand out in front of crayon CHI is not drawing with . <aft> MOT pulls hand back
CHI puts crayon in her mouth then takes it out and starts to draw . <aft> CHI moves her crayon to draw a little bit in lid then starts banging crayon on paper in box
CHI looks at MOT then looks back and forth between the paper and lid
CHI draws on another piece of paper in box
MOT turns around paper in her hand and puts it back in box then turns it around again
<aft> CHI starts to draw then holds crayon up in front of her
<aft> CHI looks at paper then at crayon
<bef> CHI watches MOT . CHI looks at paper
MOT taps paper with finger in rhythm with CHI
MOT rearranges her position and holds hand out towards CHI
MOT reaches out for crayon . <aft> MOT pulls hand back
CHI bangs other crayon on paper
CHI puts crayon down on paper then pulls it back
<bef> CHI draws a little bit . CHI puts crayon in her mouth
CHI looks at crayon in her other hand then at MOT
CHI takes crayon out of mouth . <aft> CHI starts to draw
MOT grabs hold of crayon CHI is drawing with
CHI pulls crayon away from MOT . <aft> CHI loses her balance and sits down on floor
CHI leans forward towards paper and starts banging crayon on paper
MOT grabs hold of crayon CHI is not drawing with . <aft> MOT tries to take crayon from CHI
CHI looks at crayon . <aft> CHI looks at MOT
CHI pulls crayon away from MOT . <aft> CHI puts crayon in her mouth
MOT holds finger up in front of her
CHI stops drawing and puts crayon in mouth
CHI takes crayon out of her mouth and starts drawing and then puts it in her mouth again
CHI looks at paper then at MOT
MOT leans forward looking at CHI
CHI looks up at MOT with crayon in her mouth
MOT takes both crayons away from CHI
end of PCI - Crayons and Paper
MOT reaches out for another box
<bef> MOT opens box . MOT reaches out for book
MOT picks up book and puts it on the floor . <aft> MOT picks up CHI and places CHI on her leg
MOT picks up book . <aft> MOT holds book so CHI can see pictures
MOT holds book out in front of them and moves book back and forth
CHI grabs book and turns it

CHI moves hand towards page then pulls it back

MOT looks at and points to something on page

CHI leans forward towards book and kisses item
CHI closes book with arm and leans back
MOT opens book . <aft> MOT turns page
CHI slides down from MOT's arm
MOT looks at and taps item
CHI puts hand on page . <aft> CHI turns page
MOT looks at page . <9 .> MOT looks up in the direction CHI points

CHI bends down and puts hands on book . <aft> CHI crawls towards door
MOT grabs CHI . <aft> MOT picks CHI up
MOT places CHI on her leg . <aft> MOT makes motion to pick up book
MOT grabs CHI and places her on leg again
MOT picks up book and holds it up in front of them
CHI slides down from MOT's lap . <aft> CHI reaches out for book
CHI turns around by the door and looks at MOT
MOT picks up book and reaches out for box
CHI puts hands on floor and crawls towards box
MOT puts book in box . <aft> MOT puts lid on loosely

CHI holds hand out towards something

the thing CHI picked up drops
